***************************** Readme Master ********************************

Compliance test bit streams and decoded PCM files generated by

Susanne Ritscher				     ritscher@irt.de
Institut fuer Rundfunktechnik (IRT)		     phone: +49-89-32399-458
Floriansmuehlstr. 60, D-80939 Muenchen, Germany	     fax:   +49-89-32399-415
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Test signal "Test13"
	"Test13" means the 8th item in the paper which title is
	"Schedule of activities for MPEG-2 Audio Compliance".


Files:	test13.mpg	(encoded base bitstream)
	test13.ext	(encoded extension bitstream)
	test13_c.pcm	(decoded pcm file, center channel)
	test13_l.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left channel)
	test13_lfe.pcm	(decoded pcm file, low frequency enhancement channel)
	test13_ls.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left surround channel)
	test13_r.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right channel)
	test13_rs.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right surround channel)


Description:
	matrix					0
	extension				yes
	transmission channel allocation		yes
	phantom center				yes
	prediction				yes (zero delay)
	dynamic cross talk			yes
	sampling freq.				48K
	LFE					yes
	multilingal				no
	ancillary data				yes
	bitrate base stream			384 kbps
	bitrate extension stream		MAX 
	configuration				3/2
